name: A copolymer of propylene
tetrafluoroethylene
3-trifluoropropene
FoodContactSubstance: A copolymer of propylene (CAS Reg. No. 115-07-1), tetrafluoroethylene (CAS Reg. No. 116-14-3), and 3,3,3-trifluoropropene (CAS Reg. No. 677-21-4) cured with a salt of a quarternary ammonium compound and phenol, 4,4'-(2,2,2-trifluoro-1-(trifluoromethyl)ethylidene)bis-.
